title: Commanding Heights : Ricardo Lagos | on PBS

organizations.name: UN
quotes: If we are going to be in a global world, it is going to be essential to have either the UN or some other areas to discuss these real issues

organizations.name: G7
quotes: the only way to discuss those issues is in the G7, which is fine, but the decisions of the G7 are the decisions being taken by the more developed countries

organizations.name: United Nations
quotes: The United Nations was a tremendous advance, but ... what's there going to be ... for a global world now?

organizations.name: Financial Times
quotes: read every day the Financial Times or the Herald or the Wall Street Journal -- that's it -- to see what's going on.

roles.title: president of a small country
quotes: What can I do as a president of a small country with an open economy?
What happened in Seattle is very important. The people that complained in Seattle finally accept that they are connected through the Internet; they are globalized also.
